message: Bob, I'm offering you this exceptional product for $1800000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our discussion, $1500000 is still below what this product is worth. I'm willing to come down to $1650000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique value. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1600000. I believe this brings us closer to finding a mutually beneficial solution.
